JOB DESCRIPTION: Good programming skills in languagesscripts like Shellperl and JavaPython - Should have good understanding of software product build process. - Exposure to VMWare or HyperV to manage VMs - Should have knowledge to work on both Windows and Linux environments -      Build engineering with DevOps skills using Jenkins, DockerKubernetes will be good to have - Knowledge about Apache Hadoop will be a great advantage. - Excellent communications skills both verbal and written.
